comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The question on my mind is whether or not this is in the same location and restyled from the 1923 view of the soda fountain/kiosk: www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/3985318764/

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: It's possible, if not probable, lifeasdaddy. In the next image of the staff serving customers, you can see an archway that may be the same one as here.
